answerText: Le Pere Goriot [or Father Goriot; or Old Goriot][10] Le Pere Goriot is part of The Human Comedy, a massive series of novels written by this French author.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 16 | 13 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A character in this novel gets back from a ball at two in the morning and is only let into his home because the servant was just then locking the door. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which the social climber Eugene de Rastignac courts Delphine, one of the two ungrateful daughters of the title vermicelli-maker.
